name: Running Rowdy
description:
You are the Enemy!

Have you always wanted to play a game in which you are the enemy? Then dive into the world of School Bully. 

Here you will run endlessly through the school, trying to bully as many kids as possible along the way. By bullying other kids, you score points. Collect as many points as possible and beat friends and yourself Highscore over and over again. 

The controls are simple Keyboard:

AD/ left and right arrow keys to move

E or Space to push the students

Controller:

D-Pad (left and right) or Left thumbstick (left and right)

Left face button to push the students

Credits: 

- Code/Sounds: Kevin | Dr.Kai

- Code/Character: Blagovest | Alstrak

- Assets: Eduard | messiar

- Assets: Furkan | CaterkillerH73

- Site Designs: Anton | PinkInLark 

- Music: Sound and Music for Games | We Love Indies

- SFX-Sounds: Sound and Music for Games | We Love Indies

- Made with Unreal


We don't encourage bullying in any way!!!
This game was made for a game jam with the topic
"You are the enemy"!
